comments.body:
Very cool to use ammonite here :-)
We should move more scripts to ammonite :-)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@// Based on Ammonite script created by Tomasz Godzik in scalameta/metals https://github.com/scalameta/metals/commits/main/bin/merged_prs.sc
import $ivy.`org.kohsuke:github-api:1.114`
